item.description:
NO COVER! It's Labor Day weekend-- let's do it!

This event is cross-posted with another Meetup group.

Introduce yourself at The Field pub-- (it will get kind of loud at the Cantab). If you're looking for the Meetup I will be wearing a white pirate shirt.

The Field has a new PATIO which, after 8:30, has a low-key ongoing mix & mingle party atmosphere. Seating is limited but there are also counters where we can stand. If it's raining, the back room at The Field is also very nice.

At 9:15 (or whenever suits you) we move to the Cantab, a block away. Join us there if you prefer. A good house band opens up the set around then, & people start dancing. Followed by reliably cool guest musicians about 40 minutes later. Rock, Motown, Blues, Funk. Continues until 1:30 AM.

http://www.cantab-lounge.com/public_html/ca...

sicians about 40 minutes later. Rock, Motown, blues, even funk. NOTE the Cantab accepts CASH ONLY for drinks, etc. Hint--option: three blocks down the street at the Middle East there is professional-level belly dancing from 10- 11, no cover! It's a restaurant but most people just stand at the bar while the dancers zigzag between the tables.
item.name: The Field/ Cantab Lounge FREE dancing and LIVE music
